text.section: The County Commissioners of Talbot County, in addition to, but not in substitution for, the powers which may have been or may hereafter be granted them, may require the Sheriff and deputy sheriffs of Talbot County to wear the uniforms and equipment which the County Commissioners prescribe. The Commissioners may either issue the required uniforms and equipment or reimburse the Sheriff and deputy sheriffs for all expenses incurred in acquiring them.
The County Commissioners may also require the Sheriff and deputy sheriffs to wear the uniforms and equipment at all times while on duty or performing an official act.
